ComicInfo.Title: Luba In America Part 3; Poseur; Luba's Cousin Ofelia; Spot Marks the Ex; Remember Me; A Cada Quien Lo Suyo
ComicInfo.Summary:
Luba's husband, Khamo, arrives in the States legally, but only by doing a deal to help the police track down drug traffickers.
Flashbacks to Khamo's upbringing and history pre-disfigurement.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 22:01:07. [Issue ID 627954]
